inclusion.criterion: Postoperative subjects of angioplasty with implantation of coronary stent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with ability to perform the aerobic capacity test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects culminating the cardiac rehabilitation program (3 months)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Active phase of any acute disease
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Poor adherence to the rehabilitation program (failure to comply with appointments or with the recommendations given)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain, candidate for scoliosis surgery according to perioperative MEP monitoring.
